title: Draaaaven Icon...
body: I bought Dragon Trainer Tristana and got a mystery gift... And i didn't get the Draaaaven Icon after the event.

replies.body: You'll have it on or before April 25th. :)
The probably haven't sent them out yet.
Me neither I bought project yi and it'd been 3 day since the event ended {{item:3070}} {{champion:119}}
I am also missing my Draaaaven Icon, and I got a nice chain of them going. So I most certainly did spin them axes.

cmon rito, you release mecha sion but still no draaaaven?
I bought me the primtime, gimme mah draaaaven!
i didnt get mine yet either but i thought it was kind of funny that i bought primetime draven and got pool party draven.
Same, still waiting...... Its been so long {{item:3070}}
